headline.main: SAVINGS BANKERS GET WAR SURVEY; General Somervell Says Nation May Have to Fight Whole World Single-Handed

lead_paragraph: WHITE SULPHUR SPRINGS, W.Va., Oct. 22 -- Brig. Gen. Brehon B. Somervell, Chief of the Construction Division, Office of the Quartermaster General, War Department, told delegates to the forty-eighth annual convention of the Savings Banks Association of the State of New York at the concluding session here today that despite the late start made by the United States in arming for defense, progress had been substantial and beyond all reasonable expectations.
abstract: more U S aid to Axis enemies urged by Brig Gen Somervell end Rear Adm W T Cluverius
